summary: Educational Administration Assistant Principal with 12 years in education and exceptional people skills. Create and monitor a positive safe school cultural environment that ensures growth of both students and staff. Inspire motivation to learn, skilled at building secure relationships between communities, parents, students and teachers.

experience.title: Assistant Principal
experience.description: Supervise staff; coordinate substitute schedule and sub placement; supervise staff attendance; assist in staffing highly qualified teachers (interview prospective candidates); assist Principal with developing staff meetings; coordinate staff development; conduct staff observations and conferences; assist principal with team building; generate staff warnings; supervise and coordinate after school activities and clubs; counseling and mentoring; liaise with guardians for student/academic issues; advise teachers and parents on counseling referral processes; foster student-teacher relationships; liaison for school counseling services (DePelchin); regular parent communication; plan newsletters and communications; ensure district policies and procedures are implemented; develop Emergency Operations Plan; coordinate health and safety activities; conduct drills; coordinate required safety training.

experience.title: Art Teacher
experience.description: Taught art grades 6-8; collaborated with staff, administration and VIPS (Volunteer Parents) to support school events; facilitated activities that developed students' physical, emotional and social growth.

experience.title: Fine Arts Director
experience.description: Taught art grades 6-12; developed and reviewed Fine Arts curriculum; facilitated training for Fine Arts teachers; established and coordinated professional development for Harmony's Fine Arts regional and statewide training; supervised, evaluated and mentored teachers; planned and coordinated field trips, international and national events; assisted with grant writing; initiated and implemented fundraisers; advised students on 12th grade planning; managed school-wide festivals and multicultural events; sponsored after-school art clubs.

education.degree: Master of Education â€“ Educational Administration
Bachelor of Science in Industrial Design Technology
Associate of Applied Science in Mechanical Engineering Technology

certifications: Certificate of Recognition for Exemplary Contribution to Harmony
